snippet: The deal helps Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo as he seeks to expand casino gambling and settles longstanding tax and land claim issues that have cast shadows over the Oneidas’ relationship with their upstate neighbors.
abstract: Oneida Indian Nation signs deal with Cuomo administration and local governments to guarantee them exclusive territory for their central New York casino in exchange for revenue payments to the state of around $50 million a year; deal not only helps Gov Andrew Cuomo as he seeks to expand casino gambling, but also settles longstanding tax and land claim issues that have cast shadows over the Oneidas' relationship with their upstate neighbors.
lead_paragraph: The deal helps Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo as he seeks to expand casino gambling and settles longstanding tax and land claim issues that have cast shadows over the Oneidas’ relationship with their upstate neighbors.

headline.seo: New York Grants Oneida Indians Exclusive Territory for Casino
headline.main: State Grants Oneida Indians Exclusive Territory for Casino
headline.print_headline: State Grants Oneida Indians Exclusive Territory for Casino
